author: rudolf6
content:
In addition to what Vitalik helpfully explained here, for those curious on the quantum topic I'd also recommend checking out:  

1) Ignacio's explainer on the tradeoffs of using EC-based Verkle (wrt quantum), and other areas elliptic curves currently used (1:09:21): https://www.youtube.com/live/H_M9bjwtMhU?si=L5c0YsIu0LeN7cSg&t=4161

2) Vitalik's recent ethresearch post on how to hard-fork in a quantum emergency: https://ethresear.ch/t/how-to-hard-fork-to-save-most-users-funds-in-a-quantum-emergency/18901 

(my own 2c is there are solid reasons to debate verkle vs potential other solutions, and quantum-readiness is a variable but shouldn't be a driving factor at this current point in time)
